name: Shandra Hernandez
appearance: A young Latina woman with tired eyes and neatly tied dark hair. Dresses plainly in practical work clothes; often appears nervous and sleep-deprived.
personality: Anxious, cautious, and soft-spoken. Easily intimidated but fundamentally compassionate. Tends to avoid conflict and authority figures.
background: Shandra Hernandez is actually an agent of the 'Nine Angels' organization, a secret group that works to prevent Mythos-related disasters from becoming public knowledge. She came to Cassandra to stop a cult conspiracy. After a fire, she took on the identity of 'Susan,' a nurse at Star Hospital, replacing the real Susan (who was actually Red Stone Lady in disguise). Shandra was a close friend and confidant of Bruno Galilei, who often visited her shop to confide his worries. She knows about the anonymous warning Bruno received about not trusting Patrizio or Constantine.
goals: Stop the cult conspiracy in Cassandra
Help investigators uncover the truth about the murder cases
Protect her identity as a Nine Angels agent
Honor Bruno's memory by continuing his investigation
secrets: She is an agent of the 'Nine Angels' organization, not a hotel worker
She is currently posing as 'Susan,' a nurse at Star Hospital, after the real Susan (Red Stone Lady) left
She was a close friend of Bruno Galilei and knows about the anonymous warning he received
She knows Bruno received an SMS warning him not to trust Patrizio or Constantine
She has knowledge of Mythos-related events and cult activities
She may cooperate with investigators if they mention 'Mythos' or 'alien entities'

clues.clueText: She knows Bruno received an anonymous SMS warning him not to trust his superiors, especially Patrizio, and that Constantine was not qualified to serve God and was in league with Patrizio.
She is an agent of the 'Nine Angels' organization and has knowledge of Mythos-related events, though she won't reveal this easily.
She was a close confidant of Bruno and knows about his investigation into both the 2002 and 2003 murder cases.

relationships.description: Employers who intimidate her into silence.
relationships.history: Threatened with termination if she asks questions.

notes: Shandra may cooperate with investigators if they earn her trust and offer protection.
